## Reflection

This reflection shifts from the technical to the physical: the same discipline that shapes naming conventions and workflows is now applied to the body in the cold. Exposure becomes practice, not punishment; adaptation becomes part of the ritual.

> The archive remembers the code, but it also remembers the weather that surrounded it.
